abstract: Richard D. Parsons, the former Time Warner chairman and chief executive, will step down from the board before its next annual general meeting, Reuters reported, citing a regulatory filing on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Richard D. Parsons, the former Time Warner chairman and chief executive, will step down from the board before its next annual general meeting, Reuters reported, citing a regulatory filing on Monday.

headline.main: Parsons to Step Down From Time Warner Board

abstract: A longtime Bank of America shareholder began a formal campaign on Monday to strip Kenneth D. Lewis of his chairman title, saying the bank took on too much risk by acquiring Merrill Lynch, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: A longtime Bank of America shareholder began a formal campaign on Monday to strip Kenneth D. Lewis of his chairman title, saying the bank took on too much risk by acquiring Merrill Lynch, Reuters reported.

headline.main: BofA Investor Seeks Removal of Lewis as Chairman

abstract: To Laurence D. Fink, the chairman and chief executive of BlackRock, the giant money manager, the new Treasury investment program is a highly attractive way to bring private money to help repair the financial system.
snippet: To Laurence D. Fink, the chairman and chief executive of BlackRock, the giant money manager, the new Treasury investment program is a highly attractive way to bring private money to help repair the financial system.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department’s latest plan to rehabilitate the financial sector will depend on private investors stepping up to buy problematic assets. Luckily, one of the biggest such firms has lent its public support.

headline.main: BlackRock’s Fink: Why the Treasury Plan Could Work

abstract: Timothy D. Sparapani, a lawyer at the American Civil Liberties Union, will join Facebook as its director of public policy, working from Washington.
snippet: Timothy D. Sparapani, a lawyer at the American Civil Liberties Union, will join Facebook as its director of public policy, working from Washington.
lead_paragraph: Privacy advocates who are gunning for the social network Facebook will soon have a familiar name to kick around.

headline.main: Facebook Gets New Public Policy Director
